remarks: Lattice join is associative.  Frequently-used special case of ~ latjass for atoms.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2012.)
statement:
hlatjcom.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
hlatjcom.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlatjass $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) ) -> ( ( P .\/ Q ) .\/ R ) = ( P .\/ ( Q .\/ R ) ) ) $.
